name: Life, love, death and other trifles

metadata.name: Déjà vu of «Expectation»
metadata.description:
Déjà vu - a mental state when you feel you have once been in a similar situation or a similar place.

The title "life, love, death and other trifles" describes the state of a person who finds himself in a hopeless situation. Each piece is associated with a feeling or an event that the author is living in.
